attributes.action: Replace the political system with a fair one which is accountable to the people
attributes.background: The whole brexit issue has highlighted that the commons has too much power and is not accountable enough tp the people. We need a complete change to the system to make voting fair and hold politicians to account so they cant overrule the will of the majority.  It will be the peoples parliament.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are unhappy witht the current political system, but we are not sure exactly what you'd like to replace it with. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
